message: System running in degraded mode following required rollback. Users must rejoin the server to restore full data access.

incident.impactSummary: Users must manually rejoin the server to restore access to previous data states and ensure continuity.
incident.rootCause: A recent deployment or fix required an immediate system rollback.
incident.mitigation: Service rollback successfully deployed to stabilize the environment.
incident.detection: Internal reports triggered by failure of previous fix.
actionItems: Communicate user action requirement (rejoining the server).
Monitor user connection and data synchronization rates.

postmortemPlan.summary: Analyze the cause of the initial fix failure and the impact/necessity of the resulting user-required rollback.

timeline.event: System rollback pushed following unsuccessful fix attempt.

communications.message: rollback status to degraded: Rollback has been pushed following a fix. Users must rejoin the server to restore access to old data.
